title: 超级无敌东莞#大宝剑
txt_content:
本帖最后由 949889780 于 2015-8-16 13:26 编辑 

今天lz闲着dt于是我就编写了一个逗比武器
现在个大家看一下
 




代码
/give @p minecraft:golden_sword 1 0 {ench:[{id:1,lvl:40},{id:4,lvl:20},{id:16,lvl:20},{id:17,lvl:20},{id:19,lvl:20},{id:20,lvl:15},{id:21,lvl:5},{id:34,lvl:15},{id:48,lvl:25}],display:{Name:"大宝剑",Lore:["大宝剑","在东莞提炼","了75天","诞生的剑","","","攻击力：33995","最大血量：50","速度：0.5"]},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:-141057550,UUIDMost:-141057550,Amount:33995,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1772438352,UUIDMost:1772438352,Amount:50,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1687298521,UUIDMost:1687298521,Amount:0.5,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:Speed}],Unbreakable:1,HideFlags:63}复制代码那什么攻击附魔什么的我隐藏了不要奇怪

replies.txt_content:
原子弹1号 发表于 2015-8-16 19:04
背包编辑器也可以做
1.8有背包编辑器吗

replies.author: Keterbrine_
replies.txt_content: 标题上写东莞是什么意思
然而神奇的背包编辑器就可以简单的做出来= =
